houselib package¶

Submodules¶

houselib.data module¶

houselib.data.add_new_features(df)¶

Add age, BaseLivArea, YrSold, Zoning features to df Return: df, dataframe with new features

houselib.data.add_zoning(x)¶

Function to make numbers from zoning categorial feature

houselib.data.delete_outliers(df)¶

Delete outliers, which are 3 std above the mean and sales which are non-commercial transactions, add per square foot feature Return: df_exout, df with deleted outliers

houselib.data.fill_lot_frontage(df)¶

Fill NaN values in LotFrontage feature Return : df, dataframe with filled NaN in LotFrontage

houselib.data.log_target(df)¶

log transformation of targets

houselib.data.prepare_data(df)¶

Return : df, prepared dataframe

houselib.data.read_ames_data(datapath='../data/AmesHousing.txt')¶

Read data from datapath Return : df, dataframe

houselib.location_feature module¶

houselib.location_feature.add_location_feature(df_exout)¶

Add location feature to df Return: df, dataframe with new feature

houselib.location_feature.add_neighborhood_loc(x)¶

Function to make numbers from neighborhood categorial feature

houselib.location_feature.extercond_numeric(x)¶

Creating a new numeric ordinal variable for external conditon or ‘ExterCond’

houselib.location_feature.exterqual_numeric(x)¶

Creating a new numeric ordinal variable for external quality or ‘ExterQual’

houselib.location_feature.functional_numeric(x)¶

Creating a new numeric ordinal variable for ‘Functional’

houselib.utils module¶

houselib.utils.fix_seeds(seed=42)¶

Fix random seed

houselib.utils.get_df(prepared_data_path='../data/ames_prepared.csv')¶

Read prepared data Return: df_0609, df_2010, dataframes divided into 2006-2009 and 2010 parts

houselib.utils.load_model(path='../models/model.pkl')¶

Load ML model from path

houselib.utils.save_model(model, path='../models/model.pkl')¶

Save ML model into path
